alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, southeastern Aiken and west central Orangeburg Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 318 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston, or 8 miles northwest of Barnwell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williston, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Springfield, Snelling, Elko and Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg
